name: Butternut Squash and Red Peppers
ingredients: 7 Cups 1 inch cubed peeled butternut squash ¾ tsp salt
1 ½ Cups 1 inch pieces red bell pepper 2 garlic cloves, minced
1 TBL minced fresh rosemary cooking spray
3 TBL minced fresh parsley 2 TBL grated fresh Parmesan cheese
steps: Combine first 7 incredients, tossing well. Place in a 9 x 13 cooking dish coated with cooking spray.
Bake at 450 for 30 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with cheese. Yield 5 1 cup servings.
